title: Intermittent Fasting 2025: The 4 New Rules Doctors Say Actually Reverse Aging
shortdescription: Forget 16:8 – the latest science says these tweaks deliver 3x better results.
author: Health Guru

content.content: Old Rules Are Out — These Are In
2025 research has completely rewritten intermittent fasting. Forget strict 16:8. The new gold standard combines four science-backed tweaks that slash biological age by up to 7 years:

1. Early Time-Restricted Eating (finish dinner by 6pm)
2. Protein Pacing (spread 100g+ protein evenly across meals)
3. Polyphenol Timing (berries, green tea during fasting window)
4. 36-Hour Monthly Fast (water + electrolytes only)
A new Stanford trial showed this protocol increased autophagy 300% more than traditional fasting — triggering cellular repair that literally reverses aging markers.
